description.text: Your intimacy with runes and the mysteries of ancient arcana has taught you secret ways to draw greater power from magical writings. The Cyphermages initially devised these unusual methods, but they have since spread far and wide.

sections.Benefit: You cast spells from scrolls at 1 caster level higher than the scroll's caster level. In addition, you gain a +2 bonus on caster level checks to activate a scroll with a higher caster level than your own.
